name: Pterodactly Multiplayer
description:
Your requests have been answered - Pterodactyl Multiplayer is here! ** Includes Live Chat ** Also include Offline Map. You are not required to play online. Fly with this giant beast across the beautiful Jurassic landscape. Breathe fire at your dinosaur opponents. Enter this massive 3D world and control your own flying dino - the great Pterodactyl. Customize your dinosaur to make it look anyway you wish. Glide across this huge landscape filled with enemies and magic. Chase down your enemies and gain skill and adventure points as you improve. As a bonus, we've included "instant magic" in the online version. Challenge real players, in real-time. Become the Ultimate Pterodactly in this awesome fantasy simulator.

TOP GAME FEATURES :
- Pterodactyl 3D Simulator
- Breath Fire!!
- Fully Customizable Dinosaur  - Massive 3D Open World Map with Volcano and Real Lava
- 4 Magic Skills - Fire Breathing, Ice, Invincibility, Electricity
- Weather Simulation - real weather with highly realistic rainfall and thunder
- Realistic Day and Night Cycle
- Join up to 4 other players Online
-- Team up or battle head-to-head
- Online Chat with other real players 


Explore the offline map to build up your skill points and magic. Find and discover all the magic items in the offline map in order to craft your magic. As you gain experience you can upgrade your speed, strength, and stamina.

Download Pterodactyl Multiplayer and embark on a magical multiplayer adventure !
Enemies include T-Rex, Spinosaurus, Epic Elementals, Pteranodon, Dragons, Giant Spiders, Velociraptors, and many more.

Multiplayer is a new series of games we have created at Wild Foot. We listened to all your suggestions and tried to combine them into this game. 3D animal simulation at its best.

Please stop by the Wildfoot FB page: https://www.facebook.com/wildfootgames for updates.  As always, our focus is making creative games with animals and magic. 3D Animal simulators with something special added. Good luck and have a Wildfoot day!
